attributes.action: encourage the building of transatlantic business relationships supporting the British piano making industry through sponsorship of a solo tour of Europe and America by the American singer-song-writer-pianist Tori Amos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To encourage the building of transatlantic business relationships supporting the British piano making industry through sponsorship of a solo tour of Europe and America by the American singer-song-writer-pianist Tori Amos

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
